Generated Narrative

id: ProcedurePatientSearch

url: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/mcode/SearchParameter/mcode-procedure-patient

version: 1.0.1

name: MCODEProcedurePatient

derivedFrom: http://hl7.org/fhir/SearchParameter/clinical-patient

status: draft

date: 2020-08-01

publisher: HL7 International Clinical Interoperability Council

contact: HL7 International Clinical Interoperability Council: http://www.hl7.org/Special/committees/cic,ciclist@lists.HL7.org

description: This search parameter searches for Procedures with a given patient as its subject.

jurisdiction: United States of America

code: patient

base: Procedure

type: reference

expression: Procedure.subject.where(resolve() is Patient)

xpath: f:Procedure/f:subject

xpathUsage: normal

target: Patient, Group

multipleOr: true

multipleAnd: true

modifier: missing, type, identifier

name: MCODEProcedurePatient
description: This search parameter searches for Procedures with a given patient as its subject.
